name: structFilter
description: Used to filter the key-value pairs in a structure.

params.name: struct
params.description: Name of the structure to filter

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or a function reference that will be called for each of the iteration. Returns true if the key-value pair in the structure should be included in the filtered struct. Support for passing the original struct to the closure function added in CF11 Update 5.

callback_params.description: The key for the current iteration
callback_params.name: key

callback_params.description: The value for the current iteration
callback_params.name: value

callback_params.description: A reference of the original struct
callback_params.name: struct

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true

links.title: Map, Reduce and other Higher Order Functions
links.description: A Primer for map, reduce, filter, and Higher Order Functions in general.

links.title: ColdFusion 11: .map() and .reduce()
links.description: A look at the new .map() and .reduce() methods that each of array, struct and lists all have

examples.title: Example using a simple numeric comparison
examples.description: Take a struct of items with their rating and use structFilter to return ones of a rating 3 and higher.

examples.title: Example using a member function
examples.description: This is the same example, but using a member function on the struct instead of a standalone function.
